item.title: By: Dave Robb
item.dc:creator: Dave Robb
item.description:
I've had chronic asthma for years - last year I was prescribed Montelukast in addition to my preventative steroids.
Recently I had a first gout attack- far too much beer and meat in Germany.. I could stand the pain and even walk a bit until I got to the Doctor at home for colchicine, it quickly went down . A second attack subsided very quickly likewise.
Age 65 weight 265 lbs.
I credit Montelukast from my unscientific experience as a beneficial drug for gout.
